api.output¶

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

SimpleTripOutput

Parameters:
class api.output.SimpleTripOutput(trip)¶

Bases: eflips.depot.standalone.SimpleTrip

Parameters: :param origin, destination: Depot ID of departure and destination depot upon init. Is converted to depot.depot.Depot

instance by Timetable

Parameters:

  • vehicle_types (list) – list of eflips.depot.simple_vehicle.VehicleType as str upon import, converted to eflips.depot.simple_vehicle.VehicleType before simulation start.

  • std (int) – scheduled time of departure in total seconds since sim start

  • sta (int) – scheduled time of arrival in total seconds since sim start

  • distance (int, float) – total trip distance in km

  • end_soc (start_soc,) – soc upon departure from and arrival at the depot. Must be provided if globalConstants[‘depot’][ ‘consumption_calc_mode’] == ‘soc_given’. May be omitted if consumption calculation is CR-based.

  • charge_on_track (bool) – For the use with globalConstants[‘depot’][ ‘consumption_calc_mode’] == ‘soc_given’. If True, opportunity charging on track is assumed and start_soc is interpreted as sufficient soc for departure and end_soc is interpreted as fixed value upon arrival. If False, depot charging is assumed and start_soc and end_soc are used to determine the required energy. In this case, start_soc must be higher than end_soc. May be omitted if consumption calculation is CR-based.

Attributes: :param eta: scheduled time of arrival :type eta: int :param atd: actual time of departure :type atd: int or None :param ata: actual time of arrival :type ata: int or None :param vehicle: eflips.depot.simple_vehicle.SimpleVehicle assigned to before and after departure :type vehicle: eflips.depot.simple_vehicle.SimpleVehicle :param reserved_for_init: see option prioritize_init_store in globalConstants :type reserved_for_init: bool :param vehicle_from: ID of the area the executing vehicle was located at

when calling checkout.

Parameters:

  • copy_of (None or eflips.depot.standalone.SimpleTrip) – Is set to eflips.depot.standalone.SimpleTrip object if trip was copied in Timetable.repeat_trips.

  • t_match (None or int) – time of matching this trip and a vehicle. If a vehicle from a depot’s init store is assigned, this attribute stays None. If the match changes, only the last matching time is saved.

  • got_early_vehicle (bool) – [bool] True if the trip was served by a vehicle where the battery wasn’t fully charged upon departure.

  • periodic_trigger_scheduled (bool) – bool flag to prevent recursion when scheduling a dispatch trigger for delayed trips

  • ID_orig (str) – str ID of trip this trip is a copy from, if not an original

property delay_departure¶

Return the departure delay in seconds. Return 0 if not delayed

Returns:

delayed time in seconds

Return type:

int

property delay_arrival¶

Return the departure delay in seconds. Return 0 if not delayed

Returns:

delayed time in seconds

Return type:

int

property duration¶

Return the scheduled duration of the trip. Must greater than 0

Returns:

scheduled duration time in seconds

Return type:

int

property actual_duration¶

Return the actual duration of the trip. Must greater than 0

Returns:

actual duration time of a trip

Return type:

int
